narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This 1st prelicense inspection for a Class “C” license and exit briefing were conducted with the facility representative
and  applicant. 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY CAN OCCUR UNTIL YOU HAVE BEEN ISSUED YOUR USDA LICENSE.
Power point presentation was reviewed and questions answered.
The license fee in the amount of $75.00 dollars must be mailed to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Ave. Bldg B, Mail Stop 3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
